scripts.dev: concurrently --names dashboard,firebase "npm run next-dev" "npm run emulators"
scripts.build: npm run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-functions && npm run deploy
scripts.next-dev: NODE_ENV='development' npm run handle-config && NODE_ENV='development' node server.js
scripts.emulators: cd functions && npm run init && cd .. && firebase emulators:start
